ComicInfo.Summary:
Violet Grimm's cringing beneath the stairs, crazy flashbacks flooding her mind. Dolores, the scarred living doll, is acting stranger than usual. With ouija boards exploding and the dead sending text messages, you know that something bad is going down. Does Violet's back-from-the-dead sister Bluebell have the answer, or is she part of the problem? What's hidden in the attic? And what really happened at the first (and lethally last) Vile Ettes rock concert? Prepare for shocking revelations in the Season 2 finale!
https://comicvine.gamespot.com/dogwitch-12-pretty-like-drugs/4000-175407/
ComicInfo.Title: Pretty Like Drugs
